pullrequest.title: Fix most of the codecheck warnings

content.raw:
The two remaining style issues on `Iface` should be fixed by pull request #128.

I noticed though that both locally and on pipelines `make codecheck` fails in the end:

~~~
+ make codecheck
Scanning dependencies of target codecheck
/opt/atlassian/pipelines/agent/build/src/Iface.cc:74:  Static/global string variables are not permitted.  [runtime/string] [4]
/opt/atlassian/pipelines/agent/build/src/Iface.cc:85:  Static/global string variables are not permitted.  [runtime/string] [4]
Total errors found: 2
CMakeFiles/codecheck.dir/build.make:57: recipe for target 'CMakeFiles/codecheck' failed
make[3]: *** [CMakeFiles/codecheck] Error 1
make[2]: *** [CMakeFiles/codecheck.dir/all] Error 2
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:707: recipe for target 'CMakeFiles/codecheck.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [CMakeFiles/codecheck.dir/rule] Error 2
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:714: recipe for target 'CMakeFiles/codecheck.dir/rule' failed
Makefile:457: recipe for target 'codecheck' failed
make: *** [codecheck] Error 2
~~~

Is this a problem?

I noticed though that both locally and on pipelines make codecheck fails in the end:
